name: Number Plucker
description:
Want to practice your mathematical skills and have fun at the same time? 

Do you also want to test your ability to think and react quickly? 

Then look no further - test your arithmetic skills against the clock by catching the numbers; reach the target before the time runs out, the faster you are the higher your score. Battle through numerous scenes as the numbers fall faster and faster and improve your personal best, just make sure you avoid the bombs or catching too much.
